Catoxelties glands.description: a small green Catoxelties glands filled with poison
Catoxelties glands.usage: it is used to produce a wide range of antidotes. You can't sell it in Babylon

Catoxelties poison.description: a small bottle of Catoxelties poison
Catoxelties poison.usage: it is used to produce a wide range of antidotes

bat flaff.description: Purple-brows bat's small ball of flaff
bat flaff.usage: The flaff of Purple-brows bat is a rare find, used by the locals to make the finest and very warm scarves

Purple leather.description: Purple-brows bat's piece of leather. You can't sell it in Babylon
Purple leather.usage: A piece of sturdy leather used to make clothing
